Posted By: GengilOrbios (6/22/2011 7:39:01 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Calm down fellas.  
  
This was made long times ago when Legends was meant to be the first stand alone set. So of course they needed [Scathe Zombies](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scathe Zombies) equivalent in it and they blew it.  
  
This was worse than Scathe Zombies because it was a Horseman and there was no cards that could boost Horsemen. Now, thanks to Oracle new wording, this is better than Scathe Zombies, because it the same and more.
